Class FrameworkAPP

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • FrameworkAPP
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class FrameworkAPP
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    FrameworkAPP Class

    This is the master class. It combines all the components of the game. It manages the games states and displays, runs and registers the correct elements based on the current game state. It also contains the main game loop and is responsible for managing key input from the user.

    Instance Variables:

    gameCombine: Instance of GameCombine

    mainMenu: Instance of MainMenu

    highScores: Instance of Hishscores

    instructions: Instance of Instructions

    levelSelection: Instance of LevelSelect

    learn: Instance of Learn

    aDown, dDown, spaceDown, upDown, downDown, leftDown, rightDown: Static variables to keep track of whether these keys are pressed of not

    currentLevel: current level in the game

    GameState: Manages the different game states such as playing, main menu, level selection etc

    gameState: current state the game is in

    Author:
    Utkarsh Lamba
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • releaseAllKeys

        public static void releaseAllKeys()
        Method public void releaseAllKeys()

        This static method sets all the in gameplay keys to not pressed.

      • performAction

        public void performAction()
        Method public void performAction()

        This method gives functionality to the the in gameplay keys. It performs specific functions when the keys are pressed

      • paint

        public void paint(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Method public void paint (Graphics g)

        This method is responsible for painting all the different elements on the screen. It determines the corrent components to paint based on the current game state.

        Overrides:
        paint in class javax.swing.JComponent
        Parameters:
        g - Graphics object used to paint on the screen.

      • playGame

        public void playGame()
        Method public void playGame()

        This is the main game loop. It updates all the components of the game, repaints and adds the delay to the game thread. Different components are updated based on the current game state.

      • goToNextLevel

        public void goToNextLevel()
        Method public void goToNextLevel()

        This method progresses the game to the next level and makes the necessary resets to various game variables.

      • setCurrentLevel

        public void setCurrentLevel()
        Method public void setCurrentLevel()

        This method sets the current level of the game based on the currentLevel variable.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Method public static void main (String [] args)

        This is the main method. It is shows the splash screen and runs the actual game.

        Parameters:
        args - String parameters
